name: Hexis
description:
Connect blocks together to get through doors and around obstacles. Can you beat this puzzle? Put your best times in the comments! Have fun :)

(The game works better downloaded)

Made for GMTK 2021 - "Joined Together"

Ryfi Games: https://www.ryfigames.com/

Music - William van Bremmet: https://soundcloud.com/william-van-bremmet
